Articles.Content:
Hi @ll,

I created my first liquid fuel tank for my personal SuperLifter and I want to share this with you (if anybody can reuse it). This is my first modded part designed to work with a "TD-180 Bronco Quad (3.75m)" in a heavy lifter.

Any feedback is welcome.

Description:

Super Lifter Tank (SLT-L375) (3,75m X 13m)

You can find it here under MODS/SuperLifter

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/d9fznfa7oy97fzr/Dgxyh0VmjJ

Image here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/e5v8zrrae0944uc/SLTL375.jpg

Ricky

Edited August 3, 2013 by Ricky_75
A picture is in the link next to the download file. Posting a picture from dropb*x did not work
